articles.author: Dana Milbank
articles.title: Column | I suspected a hidden killer lurked inside my body. Here’s what I found. - The Washington Post
articles.description: Like many emerging technologies, this one can improve our lives, make us miserable or both. Nobody knows yet which it will be.
articles.content:
Nine out of 10 doctors agree: I am a highly creative hypochondriac.
Using medical expertise I obtained from the internet, I have successfully misdiagnosed myself with, among other things: heart dise… [+342 chars]

articles.author: Jennifer Ouellette
articles.title: Rare set of varied factors triggered Black Death - Ars Technica
articles.description: Volcanic eruptions in the mid-1340s triggered a chain of events that brought the Black Death to Europe.
